mapper.select: SELECT c.CUSTOMERID AS id, c.NAME AS name, c.GENDER AS gender, hc.HEIGHT AS height, hc.WEIGHT AS weight, ct.CALORIES AS goalCal, ct.PROTEIN AS protein, ct.FAT AS fat, ct.CARBOHYDRATES AS carbohydrates FROM HanaCustomer c INNER JOIN CustomerTargetDiet ct ON c.CUSTOMERID = ct.CUSTOMERID INNER JOIN HealthCheckInfo hc ON c.CUSTOMERID = hc.CUSTOMERID INNER JOIN CustomerTargetdiet cti ON c.CUSTOMERID = cti.CUSTOMERID WHERE c.CUSTOMERID = #{id}
